sourcesContent:
<template>

</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      messages: [],
      inputText: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    sendMessage() {
      if (this.inputText.trim() === "") return;

      // 添加用户消息
      this.messages.push({
        id: Date.now(),
        text: this.inputText,
        isUserMessage: true,
      });

      // 发送用户消息给ChatGPT后端并获取回复
      // 你需要编写逻辑来与ChatGPT API 进行通信

      // 清空输入框
      this.inputText = "";
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.chat-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  height: 400px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  padding: 16px;
}

.chat-messages {
  flex-grow: 1;
  overflow-y: scroll;
  padding: 8px;
}

.user-message {
  text-align: right;
  background-color: #007bff;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.bot-message {
  text-align: left;
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.chat-input {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  padding-top: 8px;
}

input {
  flex-grow: 1;
  padding: 8px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 4px;
}
</style>
